title: Army Watch Face
summary: Watch Face with military precisionDate / Time, Altimeter, Step Counter, Compass
description: Android Wear Watch Face Army WatchModern watch face that has military precision in Date Time, Step Counter, Compass & Altitude. Works on Moto360 and other Smartwatch with Android Wear. For everyday usage with a modern design like a omega or suunto ambit. Round or Rectangle the watch face supports both.Modes+ Date & Time (incl. Sunset Sunrise Moonset Moonrise times)+ Altimeter (Pressure in Hectopascal and the Altitude) If there is no pressure sensor on your wear device the GPS Altitude from your phone is used!+ Steps & Compass (Pedometer and Magnetic Heading) If there is no step counter on your wear device the counted Steps from your Google Fit App are used! *You need to allow it on your phoneSwitch between modes in the settings on the companion app or on the watch face settings on your watch! (see screenshot)customization+ Save battery with ambient brightness+ Let the watch stay always on if you like+ Choose current mode of you watchinstall:After installing the app on your phone, the watch face is automatically installed on your watchLong press on the watchface clock, then select Swiss Army Watch or use the companion app.Suggestions for improvement? Just write us a mail ;-)*designed in switzerland - swiss made*
descriptionHTML:
Android Wear Watch Face Army Watch
Modern watch face that has military precision in Date Time, Step Counter, Compass & Altitude. Works on Moto360 and other Smartwatch with Android Wear. For everyday usage with a modern design like a omega or suunto ambit. Round or Rectangle the watch face supports both.

Modes
+ Date & Time (incl. Sunset Sunrise Moonset Moonrise times)
+ Altimeter (Pressure in Hectopascal and the Altitude) If there is no pressure sensor on your wear device the GPS Altitude from your phone is used!
+ Steps & Compass (Pedometer and Magnetic Heading) If there is no step counter on your wear device the counted Steps from your Google Fit App are used! *You need to allow it on your phone

Switch between modes in the settings on the companion app or on the watch face settings on your watch! (see screenshot)

customization
+ Save battery with ambient brightness
+ Let the watch stay always on if you like
+ Choose current mode of you watch

install:
After installing the app on your phone, the watch face is automatically installed on your watch
Long press on the watchface clock, then select Swiss Army Watch or use the companion app.

Suggestions for improvement? Just write us a mail ;-)

*designed in switzerland - swiss made*
comments: Needs more Great concept, but ineffectually executed. The altimeter function does not always work and there are no customization options to change from meters to feet. Also the time setting is in military and cannot change to standard.  This would be the perfect watch face if these items were addressed

Very awkward to get sunrise/set, moonrise/set. It's strangely affected by whether always-on is selected.  If Always-on is not selected on the watch, only sunrise is given when one taps to see the face. To get the other 3 times, you need always-on selected, and then to see the different times, you need to tap and allow to disappear (except for the current time which remains in ambient mode) and then retap to get another of the rise/set times. Repeated tapping while in bright mode doesn't help; it stays on the same datum.  The watch should allow a setting for how long it remains in bright mode, and then also cycle through the four rise/set times during that interval. Better yet, show all four rise/set times simultaneously.  Moon phase would be appreciated also. There's room, especially on a rectangular face.

Close to great The face looks great on my LG G Watch R. However, it is missing 2 crucial things: 12/24 h option for the main time and the option to show in the bottom display UTC time (In 12/24h independent of the main time display type)
Needs bloody 12 hr mode Come on guys have some common sense and put a 12 hr function on it ffs
Init UI error when trying to use settings on the watch. Compass and altimeter have never worked. I'm on a Moto 360. Thumbs up for this purchase :)
i know it's a military style face , but give me the option of 12hr mode. otherwise it's useless to me half of the day. great design otherwise.
